data.name: INCISION Demo
data.detailed_description:
INCISION DEMO

- One full level from the first episode
- Five weapons, all with alt-fire modes
- Five enemy types
- Four difficulty settings ranging from easy to brutally difficult
data.about_the_game:
INCISION DEMO

- One full level from the first episode
- Five weapons, all with alt-fire modes
- Five enemy types
- Four difficulty settings ranging from easy to brutally difficult

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, and DX12-capable GPUs
  • Storage: 230 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
